drinks.Description: A refreshing Italian wine-based cocktail served over ice
drinks.List of ingredients: prosecco, aperol, club soda, orange peel

drinks.Description: An Old Fashioned is a classic sweet whiskey cocktail
drinks.List of ingredients: bourbon, bitters, raw sugar, cherry garnish

drinks.Description: A sweet vodka cocktail that tastes like candy
The Dark and Stormy is a classic cocktail that originated in Bermuda. It's a refreshing and flavorful combination of dark rum, ginger beer, and lime juice
drinks.List of ingredients: 2 ounces dark rum, 4 to 6 ounces ginger beer, 1/2 ounce freshly squeezed lime juice, Ice, Lime wedge (for garnish)

drinks.Description: The Espresso Martini is a popular cocktail that combines the rich flavors of coffee with the smoothness of vodka
drinks.List of ingredients: 1 1/2 ounces vodka, 1 ounce coffee liqueur (such as Kahlúa), 1 ounce freshly brewed espresso (cooled), 1/2 ounce simple syrup (optional, adjust to taste), Ice cubes, Coffee beans (for garnish)

drinks.Description: A Chelada is a popular Mexican beer cocktail that typically consists of beer, lime juice, and salt. It is a refreshing and tangy beverage, perfect for warm weather or accompanying Mexican cuisine.
drinks.List of ingredients: 1 lime, Coarse salt, Ice cubes, Mexican lager beer (such as Modelo, Tecate, or Corona)

drinks.Description: Love a Manhattan? Then you absolutely must try this unique spin: the Brooklyn cocktail! The Brooklyn is similarly spirit forward, with a few special twists to add nuance
drinks.List of ingredients: Rye whiskey, dry vermouth, maraschino liqueur, Amer Picon

drinks.Description: Composed of Gin, Sweet Vermouth, Campari bitters, and an orange slice. Traditionally, Negronis are stirred, not shaken, and built over ice in a classic or rocks glass
drinks.List of ingredients: Gin, campari, sweet vermouth, orange peel

drinks.Description: The Whiskey Smash is a classic cocktail that’s tangy and refreshing! Starring lemon juice and mint, it’s a citrusy spin on the Mint Julep.
drinks.List of ingredients: Whiskey, lemon slice, mint leaves, simple syrup, soda water, crushed ice

drinks.Description: Tastes just like a classic peanut butter & jelly!
drinks.List of ingredients: Skrewball peanut butter whiskey, cranberry juice
